basic.floral_language:
Wisteria floribunda
Floriography: elegance, tender and sensitive 
Wisteria belongs to deciduous vines. Features: climbing winding, blade ovoid, purple flowers and small, have fragrance, a string. A string of flowers drooping down, like a waterfall, is very beautiful. Usually as a landscape ornamental trees, planted in garden, park, etc., can also be made into potted landscape beautification indoor. 
Wisteria like the sun bath, also more resistant to shade. Flowering from April to May, available for 2 to 3 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, slight resistant to shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
